1.16.5.1.1.1.10:
Added support for deadmau5 ears.
Improved determining default player model.
Clean and refactored some internal code.
1.16.5.1.1.0.9:
Tweaked skin loading
Allow PlayerMobs to have a different display name than their skin name
Clean and refactored some internal code

1.16.4.1.1.0.9:
Tweaked skin loading
Allow PlayerMobs to have a different display name than their skin name
Clean and refactored some internal code
1.16.4.1.0.5.7:
Fixed threadsafety regarding the name list
Pre randomize the names and not each time on is requested
Clean and refactored some internal code
1.16.4.1.0.2.4:
Fix crashing from dynamic registries, changed to world key
Fix rendering with Carry On
Tweaked AI priority and cleaned up goals
1.16.4.1.0.2.3: Removed double head render, decreased update interval, removed unneeded AI goals
1.16.4.1.0.1.2:
Added some more default names and reordered others
Fixed rare npe from name
Fixed dyn reg loading with the world, removed config verification
Fixed update url in mods.toml
Using vanilla customname system to "cache" text componen
